run_command_boolean.label: Run python module
run_command_boolean.tooltip: Warning: launches process to run python model on save

collocation_tolerance.label: Collocation tolerance
tooltip: Tolerance for determining collocation of data locations and ultimately deciding if incoming data should belong to an existing property group.

collar_x_name.label: Easting
collar_x_name.tooltip: Name of header field containing the collar easting.

collar_y_name.label: Northing
collar_y_name.tooltip: Name of header field containing the collar northing.

collar_z_name.tooltip: Name of header field containing the collar elevation.
collar_z_name.label: Elevation

skip_empty_header.label: Skip empty header
skip_empty_header.tooltip: Importing files without collar information results in drillholes placed at the origin. Check this box to skip these files.
